name: Blinding Revenge
description:
This is an auditory driven game, please use headphones to play

Players will need to get used to fighting with their hearing instead of sight, learning from failures and finally getting the revenge

Forgive me for not finishing the narrative part in time, it's going to be a story about revenge and resistance happened in ancient China

Controls:

Movement - A, D

Attack-K

Parry-J

Any feedback about gameplay would be helpful, thanks!
